plot: When a dispirited, aging actress and a hopeless company man choose to live out an inspiring, recurring dream, two complete strangers will discover a supernatural link.
title: City Lights
plot_es: When a dispirited, aging actress and a hopeless company man choose to live out an inspiring, recurring dream, two complete strangers will discover a supernatural link.
plot_en: When a dispirited, aging actress and a hopeless company man choose to live out an inspiring, recurring dream, two complete strangers will discover a supernatural link.
